title: Cursor wont lock to windowed game
body: When i load up league of legends now my cursor wont lock to the screen and will jump off the window when i try to move. Tried to play in full screen mode but then it jumps to my 2nd monitor. Im on a iMac :( i know i know. Please if someone can help me fix this issue so i can get back to gaming.

replies.body: I'm not familiar with the mouse cursor going off screen with a mac, but we'd like to help with this.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look into this.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
